About Me

Introduction



Hi I am Gary Noh (Sangwoo Noh).

I’m currently working in Samsung Electronics as a software engineer.
My main job is to develop automation software for SoC (Exynos) design verification.

I also work for improving SoC design verification with data analytics and machine learning / deep learning.
Even if I mostly use Python to work on those jobs, I have experiences on developing websites, Android application and a server program with Django.

My main interests are SoC, machine learning / deep learning, data analytics plus coding education and mobile healthcare.

  • Go to Projects to see what I ‘ve worked on.
  • Go to Research to see my publication.
  • Go to Activities to see my social activities.
  • Go to Blog to see my posts.
  • Click here to see my CV.

Careers

Software Engineer, Samsung Electronics

2018 — present

I've developed automation software and analyzed time series data and log data for SoC (Exynos) design verification. I also published a paper related to reinforcement learning in DVCON.

Software Engineer, BISECU

2016 — 2017

I developed Android application and analyzed Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) signal. I also visited Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2017 in Barcelona for presenting the exhibition.

Bachelor's Degree, Gachon Univ.

2012 — 2018

I studied in Software Dept. I got 4-year scholarship from the university. I also worked in HCI / Mobile Healthcare Lab (Prof. Ahyoung Choi) as a research assistant from 2017 to 2018.
